projects.name: Cryptoverse
projects.description: Cryptoverse is a fully responsive, dynamic web application that uses multiple APIs to create a real-time database of cryptocurrencies and crypto-related news.

projects.name: ECommerce
projects.description: ECommerce is a web store that utilizes CommerceJS's API service to supply products to the storefront. Completely responsive, and the product page can be changed through CommerceJS.

projects.name: WeatherJS
projects.description: WeatherJS is a weather app that displays the current weather of a location. Data is provided by OpenWeather's API. Tested with Jest and React Testing Library to ensure maximum code confidence.

projects.name: Space Tourism
projects.description: Space Tourism is a fully responsive website converted from a design provided by FrontendMentor.io. This website's content is rendered from a JSON file.
